The [[Mother and Father]] [[Puppet|puppets]] join hands, extending a razor wire that [[Chiyo]] uses to initiate a flurry of deadly attacks. The wire is strong enough to slice cleanly through the [[Third Kazekage (puppet)|Third Kazekage]] puppet's [[Thousand Hands Manipulation Force|Thousand Hands]] technique.

== Trivia ==
* While not named in the anime or the manga, the technique was given a proper name in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 5]]''.
